channel.title: Reflection on Ian Ames - I help multidisciplinary teams deliver services in a user centred way.
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Ian Ames - I help multidisciplinary teams deliver services in a user centred way.

item.title: What do I do now?
item.description:
I’ve never been much of a one for career planning, from reading the ‘5 minutes with’ series from Jon Rhodes that seems to be a common trait of delivery people, lots of us kind of fall into it and enjoy it, that’s certainly been my situation.

The Amesy method of career development:
